results.title: [Effect of diroton on characteristics of 24-hours arterial pressure monitoring in hypertensive patients with polycythemia vera].
results.text_hl: AIM: To study the data of 24-h monitoring of blood pressure (MBP) and effects of an @GENE_AP2B1 @GENE_163 @@@ACE@@@ inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (diroton) in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Polycythemia_Vera</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011087 @@@polycythemia vera@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Polycythemia_Vera</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011087 @@@PV@@@).
